title: The Boy I Once Hated
description:
I've always heard there's a fine line between love and hate. 
No one told me that line could destroy me. Noah Fontaine. King of the school. My living nightmare. The object of my fantasies. My new stepbrother. I did whatever it took to survive him. Every day he took more of me. I just didnâ€™t expect him to take my heart. 

Because of the boy I once hated, I'd never be the same girl again.
author: C.R. Jane
